definitions.title: n. pr. loc.
definitions.body: ‘Abarîm (prop. regions beyond river or sea);—usu. ´[[הַר הָע]] Nu 27:12, De 32:49 ( = [[הַל־נְבוֹ]]; both P), and ´[[הָרֵי הָע]] Nu 33:47 ([[לִפְנֵי]] [[נְבוֹ]]), v:Nu 33:48 (P); alone only [[חַעֲקִי מֵעֲבָרִים]] Je 22:20; the mountainous district in NW. Moab, just NE. of Dead Sea, GASm:Geogr. 548 and EBi Buhl:Geogr. 122; LXX Abareim(-ein), but to\ e)n tw|= pe/ran Nu 33:47, ei)v to\ pe/ran th=v qala/sshv Je 22:20.—Vid. also sub [[עִיִּים]].
